translations: 眼镜；精彩的表演，壮观的场面（spectacle 的复数）

sentences.sentence: He looked at me over the tops of his spectacles.
sentences.translation: 他从眼镜的上方看了看我。

sentences.sentence: He wears huge spectacles with thick tortoiseshell frames.
sentences.translation: 他戴着厚玳瑁框的大号眼镜。

sentences.sentence: He tends to view the world through rose-coloured spectacles.
sentences.translation: 他总是戴着玫瑰色的眼镜看世界。
